creator: carnold@apache.org
text: A substantial portion of the size of log4j.jar is due to LF5 and Chainsaw 1 (log viewing applications) that are obsolete.  Offering an alternative smaller log4j without GUI components would be desirable.

creator: antony.stubbs@gmail.com
text:
A version of this has been made here:
http://github.com/astubbs/log4j/tree/modulriseify
